pr_title: Allow index filtering in field capabilities API

timeline.message: fix cross cluster propagation of index filter

timeline.bodyText: PUT? shouldn't it be a POST?
timeline.author: jpountz

timeline.bodyText: It's a pre-existing issue but I'd rather like that we use readOptionalWriteable for symmetry with writeTo, which uses writeOptionalWriteable. Or change the write logic to write booleans.
timeline.author: jpountz

timeline.bodyText: question: in what cases would the current timestamp already be set?
timeline.author: jpountz

replies.bodyText:
If the action is executed by a cross cluster search. See https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/pull/57276/files?file-filters%5B%5D=.java#diff-7bbfa44263f4c8fc5d8620e78cfe088bR130.
I added a comment in fb3007c
replies.author: jimczi

timeline.bodyText: Saying "replica" confused me because it made me think that we might check multiple copies of the same shard in some cases, while the below logic suggests that we just check one copy for every shard until we find one that matches. Should this comment say "shard" instead of "replica" in this comment?
timeline.author: jpountz
